Reviews.Title: “Rufus T.”
Reviews.Author: Rufus T
Reviews.Content: I stay at this property on every visit to Dallas. The rooms are especially clean & the grounds are always well kept. The staff is both courteous & helpful & will go the extra mile. It's very centrally located & has a nice pool & other cozy outdoor areas to enjoy. This place is great for individuals, couples or families. Great price also!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfy at a great price!”
Reviews.Author: toolgal2
Reviews.Content: We were stopping through Dallas for one night and got two rooms. This is a clean hotel with friendly and helpful service. We slept great in the comfortable beds and it was quiet! Security presence was around the parking lot all hours. The attention to detail is awesome here down to the fanned washcloths and kleenex box in the bathroom. They thought of everything so you don't have to. This is hands down the best place we have ever stayed. Before you go to sleep be sure and set both thermostats in your room, there are two. Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: “Super clean affordable hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Jenileib
Reviews.Content: This place was Super clean! Not a single bug! Security constantly was present patrolling parking lots! Very safe and secure feeling. Fantastic service. Nice people! Very affordable!

Reviews.Title: “Made to feel at home!”
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: This is my first for Candlewood, and they will see me again for sure. A large suite with all the necessities of feeling like your in an apartment fully furnished. The bed was very comfortable and pool outside looked very inviting. Just too cold to swim right now, but will have me doing a back stroke next time. Fitness room was very nice!

Reviews.Title: “Nice location, watch the showerhead!”
Reviews.Author: ljmzta
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with another couple on a Saturday night. The manager was working the front desk and was very nice, he commented about what a super rate we received (thanks to holiday-inn.com). We chose this location due to price, we wanted something Uptown but with rooms costing over $200 a night, I was sure we could do better. I found this place for $60.99 + tax. We needed a double in one room which is what was on our reservation but were given 2 singles, luckily the manager was easily able to correct the situation. As I went to take a shower, I didn't realize that the shower nozzle was pointed directly out of the shower and at my face, I guess the housekeeper is some sort of sadistic practical joker. She apparently had done this enough times that the drywall had been repaired from multiple soakings. The other couple we stayed with who were next door had the same experience, I wish I could have warned them in advance. Overall though, the front desk workers were nice and the room was nice and I would stay here again, just remember to watch out for the shower!

Reviews.Title: “Everything you need, and Haagen-Dazs too!”
Reviews.Author: FlightSafetyGuy
Reviews.Content: Faced with 5-days in the same city (Dallas, Texas) attending a conference I chose to stay at The Candlewood Suites on the Stemmons Freeway. Financially a much better deal than staying in one of the conference hotels and it had everything I needed. I prefer to stay in a suites hotel when I am in a city for more than a few days and the Candlewood was everything that I expected; so I wasnâ€™t disappointed nor was I amazed by any of the services provided. The â€˜Candlewood Cupboardâ€™ provided adequate sustenance when I needed something in addition to the â€˜conference foodâ€™ I was getting elsewhere, and tubs of Haagen-Dazs for that 3 am snack when I was battling with jet-lag. I only wish that they had had an alternative to the incredibly sweet pastries that are obviously the delight of all Americans. Something bland, like plain wholemeal bread, for those of us who choose not to take on masses of sugar with every bite, would have been appreciated, and perhaps a pop up toaster in the room would have been nice. The Shuttle Bus was, for me, a bit of a disaster. Not as easy to arrange as they would have you think. I ended up at the wrong rail station on the first morning, and I quickly gave up the idea of using it and relied on taxis ($18 to the Dallas Convention Centre), which the Front Desk quickly and cheerfully arranged for me. Next time I have to stay for a few days in another American City I will probably be back at the Candlewood Suites as it is comfortable and does represent value for money.

Reviews.Title: “i wont stay anywhere else but here”
Reviews.Author: Teresa B
Reviews.Content: ever one is so nice i will go back and stay again and the rooms were so clean and nice i love this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Big Time Hospitality!”
Reviews.Author: William M
Reviews.Content: From the gentleman who went out of his way to hold the front door open for me to the girls behind the front desk, I got an incredible welcome to this Candlewood Suites Hotel. I travel 3 weeks out of the month and will not forget this place. I spun a wheel at the front desk and won a food voucher. I got assistance with returning my rental car and then Senedu and Diana went way beyond the call of duty and arranged a ride to the airport at 4:15am!! When was the last time a staff went the distance for you? These empolyees have seen the light!! They understand who writes their paychecks. The owner/manager of this hotels has done an outstanding job with these workers. Thank you Candlewood.....I felt right at home! mrbill from urbana, ohio

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel”
Reviews.Author: KrysGT
Reviews.Content: Hotel was beyond awesome. First the hotel team from the front desk to the housekeeping were the nicest most caring people I have met and I travel a lot! We normally stay elsewhere during our market trips in Dallas but could not get reservations for the time we needed to be there. Candlewood worked us in and then made us feel like family. The hotel shuttle was the most accomidating transportation and the drivers were wonderful. All future trips will be booked at Candlewood. Special thanks to Senedu - your entire team rocks!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Serials
Reviews.Content: This is a great hotel. Everyone that works there was fantastic when I stayed there January 29 & 30 2012.

Reviews.Title: “great service all the time i enjoy my stay everytime i stay”
Reviews.Author: darrick e
Reviews.Content: i would not stay anywhere but dallas candlewood Suites stemmons freeway, staff have been great to me i have been cooming over a year they are great people senedu ,david , diana ,valerie ,

Reviews.Title: “quality service by all staff great”
Reviews.Author: jay p
Reviews.Content: we lived here for 3 months and the staff took great care of us nice rooms comfortable beds and living area one of the best hotels that you could ask for when living on the road thanks for the great service

Reviews.Title: “Very enjoyable experience”
Reviews.Author: Lisa P
Reviews.Content: I had a memorable experience at this hotel. The concierge was very helpful, the guests were easy to get along with. I especially liked having access to free coffee each morning and being from Louisiana this was essential to my daily routine. The bed was very comfortable and the room was arranged to the utmost utilization and comfort. I loved looking out over the pool in the evenings from my window. The pool looked very nice, however I was unable to use it due to my rigorous schedule.

Reviews.Title: “excellent accomodations”
Reviews.Author: mtharbor
Reviews.Content: We had booked this suite on line. We were not sure what we were going to get when we checked in. The suite was wonderful!! We had two bedrooms, each with its own TV, two bathrooms, living room with recliner and kitchen. It was more than we expected and a wonderful value for what we were charged. The free internet worked great. It is very hard to find hotels that allow smoking in the room. This one did allow it, which made us very happy. The staff were all friendly and helpful. It has a very nice outdoor area to sit and relax, and bbq if you would like to. We would definitely stay here again. It was easy to get to from the Market Center, which means a lot in downtown Dallas, because of all the traffic.

Reviews.Title: “Home Away from Home”
Reviews.Author: Omar-2011-45
Reviews.Content: Just wanted to say thank you to the staff for making me feel at home and providing me with everything i needed to make my stay very comfortable.I especially wanted to thank Valerie Guerra at the front desk for all her assistance during my stay.

Reviews.Title: “Going the Extra Mile!”
Reviews.Author: Alexis C
Reviews.Content: Being apart of a traveling construction company, we have seen our fair share of hotels. Candlewood Suites has made us feel as if this is our home, even if it is just for a few short months. The atmosphere and staff members have made us feel like we are truly important guests and not just another room number. The service provided by Vanessa, at the front desk, is and was always above and beyond what anyone could ever expect. She goes out of her way to solve any issues you may have, and makes sure you are comfortable, and leave with her desk with a smile!

Reviews.Title: “A place that I can call home”
Reviews.Author: Catarino M
Reviews.Content: I just wanted to say thank you for making me feel welcomed. I truly believe that you live by your name and it does feel like my home away from home. The shuttle service was something I did use to get to and from the airport. The staff is great and when I had a question, they were there to help. I especially want to thank Valerie Guerra for her kindness and going out of her way to help me, a true asset to the company. I know that in the future I will stay at Candlewood.

Reviews.Title: “There are better hotels in the area...”
Reviews.Author: MisterGrace
Reviews.Content: Pros: Inexpensive; airport shuttle service Cons: Lower-class version of Residence Inn (Marriott) or Homewood Suites (Hilton); dirty carpet; housekeeping service once per week, so if you check in after the scheduled day for your room, you don't receive housekeeping service; you are told at check-in if you need fresh towels to bring your dirty ones to the front desk and they will exchange them for you; pillows were so soft they provided no head support; NO food provided...there is a pantry where food can be purchased. I stayed at this hotel because it is across the street from where I was working. However, in the future I will pay the difference to stay at another brand.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it, the atmosphere was very pleasant and all the employess appeared friendly and helpful.”
Reviews.Author: rstephenson3
Reviews.Content: Would like to especially acknowledge Ernesro Cordova III, he was very helpful, knowledgeable, friendly and patient! I was having a pretty hectic moment at one point, however, Mr Cordova, observing my situation, calmly commense to iterate to me, "MA'AM ITS OK, JUST TAKE YOUR TIME". Wow! I'm sorry, but you just dont get much of this type of customer service in this world of hustle and bustle. Even if an employee makes this statement to you, it usually comes across as generic and scripted. Mr Cordova eased my anxiety, which contributed to a good night sleep...and loved the bed and towels!

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice Hotel And Staff”
Reviews.Author: MsFlowers
Reviews.Content: This was a very nice hotel that I choose to stay in. The suites were nice, clean, and up to date. The Manager (Renee) was very helpful during our stay the staff was also wonderfull. If you are every in Dallas stay at this location it is worth the vist.

Reviews.Title: “Decent property, strange experiences though”
Reviews.Author: Kevlondon
Reviews.Content: This was our third Candlewood stay on our current vacation, and I always look forward to having a proper suite with separate bedroom and living space. Things got off to a strange start when we were given keys to a room that was already occupied, and we ended up face to face with these occupants after 5 minutes of trying to open their door. The hotel is so big that it was a big trip back to the front desk to get the room changed. Luckily the replacement room was absolutely fine. We had a mountain of laundry to do, unfortunately one of the machines we loaded up wasn't working, which we only found out after we'd filled it with clothing, powder and softener. They also don't operate the honesty system for the cupboard at this location - items must be paid for at the front desk. In view of our problems, they did give us a few dollars off our purchases. The final issue came at checkout, when we were faced with yet another clerk who had never seen a travelers check before - the cost had to be credited back to my card and then a 10-minute wait while she phoned the manager to check that they were acceptable. Location was pretty good, a 15-minute drive from downtown Dallas. Pool looked good, although we didn't manage to use it.

Reviews.Title: “all the steff and managers are sweet and nice to me”
Reviews.Author: sweet1010
Reviews.Content: all the steff and managers were nice and sweet to me they answer all of my questions that i had for them. Renee Gilder was nice to me and she is one of the managers here at candlewood suites. there is steven he was nice enough to let me if i need any thing dont forget to ask.and he is the directer of sales here at candlewood suites. there is valerie guerra who was nice and sweet and friendly to me when i was there she asked me if i need anything to tell her and she will get it for me.she to is a manager here in candlewood suites. shamia asaria is very careing to to and make share i have a great time here at candlewood suites and steven shove is a nice to.she to is a manager here at candle light suites..david moore is happy man because i am here he think of me as a friend. he makes share i have all of my questions answered and he is friendly he is a funny sometimes but he is a great manager at the front desk of the candlewood suites

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding service, Highly Recommend”
Reviews.Author: chris5706
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff make it a point to know your name and assist you in any way. Everything was super clean, hotel is modern, not outdated. Shuttles provided all day for numerous trips in "D". Pool extra large, landscaped well. Extremely safe, numerous lights and even safety patrols at night.

Reviews.Title: “will never find a better place in the world to stay”
Reviews.Author: kqw2011
Reviews.Content: We started staying in 2009-2011.We stayed for months at a time for medical reasons. I can't think of any negative, all perfect! Staff is above and beyond. They even carried a woman to shop, picked her up out of her wheelchair & carried her to her room because it was raining. They have the same staff year after year. I know when I get there I am with "family" because everyone who walks in their doors are treated above & beyond. Rooms are extremely clean, free up to date laundry, gas grills, clean pool, gym, kichenette, most comfortable beds,food pantry. I would never stay anywhere else. Manager Senadu sees to it that your stay a wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “I'd rather sleep in my car”
Reviews.Author: Bruce_411
Reviews.Content: I have Gold status. I wonder how they treat people they know would never come back! No towels in my room. Worst front desk service ever. I called the desk to get the name of a cab service. "Mike" tells me the number, but when I ask for the address of the hotel (it's not listed anywhere in the room), he tells me "I'm busy here, there are a lot of people here!" Really?! That's his answer? Definitely will never stay here again and wouldn't recommend it either.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Room, Terrible Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: pritcheb
Reviews.Content: The rooms are very comfortable and the location is convenient to Love Field, but customer service from the management and the sales department (Steve) was horrible. After spending nearly $4,000 at this hotel, you would expect to be treated well, but that is not the case here. I was given a quote by Steve in the sales department for a three month business stay, but when I called back to make the reservation with him, he pretended not to know me and refused to honor the quote he gave me. When trying to resolve this situation with management, I was treated poorly and ignored.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, So-So Service”
Reviews.Author: tuanngai
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed the hotel and all it had to offer. However, the front desk staf that I dealt with was very curt, condescending, and less than friendly. I didn't receive the wake up call and housekeeping wasn't notified of the late check out I requested. In fact, everything we requested seemed to be a bother to the desk staff.

Reviews.Title: “Covenient Location but bad service”
Reviews.Author: joyberry1022
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean, furniture was to update and the location is conveniently close to the highway. Unfortunately, our ladder was stolen off our car and the front desk could not do anything about it. The "security" camera was blocked by a tree and the front desk said they wouldn't be able to see the license plate even if it wasn't blocked. The front desk was not friendly or helpful. Our keys expired every other day even though we were in the system to stay for an entire month. We left early due to the reasons mention.

Reviews.Title: “Sometimes it's nice to go where everybody knows your name!! (sing it)”
Reviews.Author: Stoly1
Reviews.Content: I stay at this hotel every time I am in Dallas. The staff is wonderful and it is nice to be greeted by your name when you're just having one of those awful travel days. Even when they are very busy the staff is always very attentive to all of the guests as far as I can tell. I especially appreciate the extra courtesy I am given when I checkout. Admittedly I tend to run a little behind schedule...okay...alot behind. Senedu and I have gotten to know each other for this reason and she helps keep me on my toes but more importantly she is always willing to work with me to find a solution that works for everyone. On several occasions she has graciously forgiven my later than late checkout and even redone the billing on top of it because at the last minute I wanted to use a different method of payment than the credit card I checked in with. So thank you to Senedu as well as the rest of the staff and see you again soon. Trust me, with all of the hotels in the Market Center area this one is definitely worth going back to!

Reviews.Title: “Look no further...what a God send”
Reviews.Author: msroanna
Reviews.Content: My elderly parents were needing extended stay lodging with daily shuttle service to Southwestern University for medical treatments. Nothing fancy, clean, comforts of home, did I say clean?, economical, safe, modern day conveniences, no frills...a place to call "home" while they took care of their health. Candlewood Suites was perfect. MORE than what they needed...and didn't kill the pocketbook. They didn't use the pool or the neat park area with grills; but, enjoyed being independent with the inhouse laundry room facility, shuttle service. The kitchenette made for less shuffle and they could cook and eat at whim. Courteous staff and well monitored parking lot.. They got a 5 star rating from 2 very scrupulous people!

Reviews.Title: “The staff is wonderful at this hotel”
Reviews.Author: NancyGR19
Reviews.Content: I've stayed a number of times at this Market Center Hotel and always enjoy the accommodations. We hit a bit of a snag this time and our room near the freeway was just too noisy. Senedu, the front desk manager understood and after a busy day at market we came back and found that she had moved us to a very quiet suite. We stay at this hotel at least twice a year and will definitely continue to do so.

Reviews.Title: “Dependable Staff & Clean Rooms”
Reviews.Author: heidi_skelton
Reviews.Content: My husband is on the liver transplant list at Methodist Dallas Medical Center. We have to travel to Dallas once per month for his doctor visits and we alway stay at Candlewood Suites (Market Place). Senedu is the hotel Manager and has been a wonderful person to work with. Our room has always been clean and comfortable and the staff has always been very helpful. We would not stay anywhere else for our monthly trips to Dallas. Austin, Texas

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful hotel for extended stay”
Reviews.Author: phamshari
Reviews.Content: This hotel was amazing. The kitchen was beautifully outfitted; the rooms immaculately clean; the beds and pillows comfortable; the staff courteous and helpful. I was thrilled that such a hotel as this is available to the public, especially for extended stay. I have booked at this hotel for our next trip to Dallas in March.

Reviews.Title: “The staff at this hotel are fantastic!”
Reviews.Author: Serials
Reviews.Content: This hotel is fantastic! The location is great. The staff is excellent, they are caring and willing to help in any way they can. The shuttle service is the best I have ever had the opportunity to use. The rooms are comfortable, spacious and nicely arranged. I would recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Senedu Hailu - Horrible customer service!!”
Reviews.Author: doreliz8
Reviews.Content: NEVER...in my entire life have been mistreated and disrespected the way I was when I encountered Senedu Hailu at this hotel. I was staying in Dallas for some training and pre-paid for my hotel a couple of weeks ahead of time. The training was supposed to be 5 days but it was shortened to 4 days instead. When I came back to the hotel I spoke to a gentleman named David to see if it was possible to get a refund or credit for that last night. He told me it should not be a problem but to speak to Senedu in the morning because he did not have the ability to do it for me. I looked for her in the morning and she had not yet arrived. I came back during my lunch break and explained my situation. She told me that I could not receive a refund or credit because I pre-paid. I said thanks and went to my room. When I was leaving a few minutes later I wanted to give her a heads up that her employee said I could get a refund and she should inform him that it is not possible for those who pre-pay so he doesn't misinform someone else in the future. At this point she went off about the fact that I was not going to get a refund (which I wasn't asking for) and would not let me speak. She actually interrupted me mid-sentence to go into a soapbox and would not let me get a word in. I finally said that I didn't appreciate her rudeness and the fact that she would not let me speak and I left. She had other employees with her behind the counter and all of them looked embarrassed about the way she was acting. I spoke to one of those employees later and he was appalled by the way she acted. He told me that she can be nice but it depends on the person. He said I probably rubbed her the wrong way and that set her off. I spoke to other staff members and most of them said that she was difficult to work with and for. They asked me why I was bringing it up and when I mentioned what happened none of them seemed surprised. I will NEVER stay at this hotel again!

Reviews.Title: “hotel is good place.. Internet sucks”
Reviews.Author: abnoxious
Reviews.Content: I have been staying in this hotel from last 3 months.... the management of this place have been promising good internet facilities but it really really sucks ur life out...the net get disconnected very often.. if you are a working professional and have to work from home then not the right place to be...repeated complaints to management about poor service of internet falls on deaf years... The other facility in the hotel is good... i have not faced any other major issues...

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable bed / excellent value”
Reviews.Author: Stehr67
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for OU texas weeekend. The hotel was rennovated and I have to say the bed and pillows were the most comfortable I've ever experienced at a hotel. You could tell everything was pretty much brand new the couch and easy chair in the living room was awesome. The other major difference was the friendliness of the staff. I asked about where a certain eating place was they pulled up a map and printed it then showed me a desk where they had all kinds of flyers and menus for close restaurants. One of my better experiences at a hotel. Especially considering the crazy weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: dhmoore10601
Reviews.Content: Room accomodations clean and great for price Near airport, restaurants, right off of I-35 staff pleasant and courteous Would recommend to anyone

Reviews.Title: “nice stay”
Reviews.Author: ingomaurer
Reviews.Content: i've been temporarily staying in the candlewood suites dallas, market center for some time. doing business here in dallas. when i first walked into the candlewood, i met a mgr named senedu. was greeted with a genuine smile and and worked with me to get the best accomodations possible for me. as my time that i have spent here, has been very enjoyable & pleasant. the administration,mgrs.,maintenance technicians, "excellent" housekeeping people, all have been very enjoyable. want to say that both the interior and exterior of the hotel is immaculate at all times. being a business man, i know how important genuine customer service is. the entire staff has went above and beyond the normal. i would highly recommend this hotel to my friends,business acquaintenances,clients etc for them to come and enjoy the stay like i have. stephen w. hart ## venture creative lighting

Reviews.Title: “Great stay; great value!”
Reviews.Author: KarlC42
Reviews.Content: I stayed two weeks on business and though this is not a five star resort, it IS a great value for the business or single-night traveler. The business center and free high speed Internet were both great and provided the ability to work as if I were in my own office. The property was clean and well maintained and the staff were friendly and very helpful. I do not remember names well but noteworthy were Dave, Chris, and Senedu. Seinedu even filled out my Priority Club membership application while I loaded my car! I spent quite a few nights on the road and have yet to find a property that is any better than this one. I will be staying here again next week even though there are closer hotels to my business venue. This is a good value long-term stay or single night stay property - great job guys and gals! I highly recommend this property. :) Karl

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: FProfeta
Reviews.Content: Hotel was clean, staff was courteous & the rooms are very good size. I would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay, excellent service”
Reviews.Author: TrumpetDude
Reviews.Content: Hotel is right off the freeway and close to Love Field so convenient location. Front desk clerk was outstanding & very helpful. Rooms are nice, clean, good amenities (like a full sized fridge). Nice courtyard. The coffee offered in the lobby wasn't very good, but the ones with the room coffee maker were sufficient. Overall would recommend. Good breakfast at the restaurant next door. (tip: they'll deliver to the hotel!)

Reviews.Title: “Great for the business traveler, excellent staff.”
Reviews.Author: thevern
Reviews.Content: The rooms were clean and comfortable. The mattresses are very comfortable, good pillows. Very competetive pricing. The staff is great. Free washers & dryers. Complete exersize room. They are continually improving thier facility. The rooms have full sized refrigerators and dishwashers with other amenities. Solid surface countertops. Large pool. Additional courtyard with barbeque grills. The store is well stocked. Everything you need and more. This hotel is better than the new Holiday Inn Express. I highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “excellent service”
Reviews.Author: onfireTexas
Reviews.Content: we checked into a 1 bedroom suite.wife son and myself.A/C wasnt working so we called front desk.within an hour they switched us to a beautiful 2 B/R suite at no additional charge.room was fantastic.we would definately stay there again inthe future.front desk manager was Senedu Hailu and she was very friendly and made our stay comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely the best experience possible”
Reviews.Author: nurav666
Reviews.Content: First, My trip was made a success thanks to the dedication and friendliness of Ms. Senedu Hailu who went above and beyond to make me feel welcome and cater to my every need. Her hospitality and friendliness always made me feel welcome and if there was any employee I would recommend for praise, it would be her. She worked diligently to not only give me a good deal on my extended stay but also to make it as comfortable as possible. She definitely proved that there are still some hotels who consider customers as their number 1 priority. I have no complaints about my stay and since I stayed for about two months, I can safely say if I were to go back to Dallas, this hotel would be my first choice.

Reviews.Title: “Market Center Hotel”
Reviews.Author: KClevenger71
Reviews.Content: Stay here every time I go to or pass through Dallas! Great Location and GREAT hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: ruvidu
Reviews.Content: There were two reasons for choosing this hotel. 1. I had enough points that it only cost me $30 for the one night. @. It was 5 minutes from my families home there is Dallas and it made for an easy commuite. Bed was clean and comfortable. Bath was better than expected. Staff were excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel but bad first impression”
Reviews.Author: Js154
Reviews.Content: The check in was great untill Senedu the front desk clerk told me to take all my things out of my car like GPS and laptop do to guest cars getting broken into.I asked her if it happend alot and she said no but it left me a little worried.The room was great she gave me an upgraded due to my PLT status with priorty club and the room looked really clean.Later that night I went to talk to the front desk clerk about how safe the hotel was and he ensured me that security was already on property, he walked me outside to show what procedures they take to secure the hotel and that made me feel really comfortable.Many thanks to the night clerk ,I didn't get his name since he had his jacket on (the lobby was really cold) but he was a young hispanic guy.I will come back in a couple of weeks and stay here.Good job Candlewood

Reviews.Title: “Good price.”
Reviews.Author: d3smith1
Reviews.Content: Had a 4-night stay with a reasonable rate. Nice beds and kitchen. Only issue was with the shuttle one night when it took us to the grocery store as we requested, followed by unexpected picking up and dropping off of several other people around the greater dallas area which took over an hour.

Reviews.Title: “Exactly what we needed.”
Reviews.Author: RetiredOklahoma
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had the need to spend several weeks in Dallas and decided to at least start in a Candlewood Suites. After the first week we decided to continue for the duration of our stay which turned out to be about six weeks. I had stayed hundreds of nights in a Candlewood Suites in Houston prior to my retirement so was very familiar with the hotel but found this particular one to be exceptional. The staff at the front desk, particularly Senedu Hailu, were always helpful and courteous no matter what we needed. The maid service was efficient and thorough. The grounds and facilities were well kept. The washing machines and dryers (free by the way) were in good condition. This hotel was an exceptional value and exactly what we needed during our time in Dallas.

Reviews.Title: “We will only stay at this motel when in the area”
Reviews.Author: TigerII
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were in the F4 Tornado that hit Lone Grove, Oklahoma 2/10/09. My husband was flown on a medical jet to Parkland Hospital and that was the beginning of our relationship with Candlewood Suites in Dallas Market Center. My Father-in-law died in the tornado and we stayed in this motel for about 3 months. My husband was in a coma for 6 weeks. Senedu Hailu knows my voice when I call for reservations when we have to visit My husbands physicians....she knows my family's names and remembers all we were going through. I cannot tell you how nice it is to have someone make y ou feel like this us your home away from home.....The whole staff has been nothing but absolutely wonderful to us and the rooms are clean and always fresh. They go out of their way to help us in any way possible. Thank you again for such a wonderful hotel and staff. They are indeed the best ever. Sincerely Julie Wheat

Reviews.Title: “pleasantly surprised, secure, comfortable, overwhelmingly wonderful”
Reviews.Author: wiffyatthehub
Reviews.Content: The hotel was great, the room fantastic and the front desk manager Senedu Hailu was wonderful during check in and went beyond the call of duty on check out. My suitcase had been left behind in the parking lot and i called and she went out after it and "rescued" my belongings. I'm very grateful. In this day and age it's rare to find someone who will do what needs to be done with a "happy" attitude. Please give her my best and tell her to keep up the good work

Reviews.Title: “Becareful of of the extra fees”
Reviews.Author: chevyss789
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the hotel because of the location, once I checked in the clerk made me aware of all the surroundings and what was open to get something to eat late since since I checked in around 2am.He first said that there cupboard had many iteams that I could take up to my room to eat so I wouldn't have to leave the hotel.I asked how the hotel van worked and he said that they go in a 5 mile radius of the hotel but to check with the morning staff to get the exact locations of van services.Well in the morning thats when all the problems happen I talked to the office mgr and she didn't want to help me with any of my questions,when I asked her if I could maybe get a room with two beds because I was going to have friends stay over she said I would have to pay an upgrade fee and then extra person fee.No where does it say on there reservation screen of these extra fees.I thought since I was a PC member I would get some kind of break or respect but I guess not,this is a nice place to stay but I guess you just have to talk to the right people to get good customer service.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic experience....”
Reviews.Author: Paducahbear
Reviews.Content: What a great place to stay....handy, accessible, nearly anything you could want from a hotel of this level. It's an extended stay hotel, you expect that you will not have daily service. If you don't understand that or don't like it, stay somewhere else! The staff was great, the 2 room suite was perfect and the location was very handy to Market Center as well as airport/anywhere else due to proximity of I-35. Country Pantry, Secure Parking with nightly guard, extremely clean, free internet and very comfy beds/bedding/pillows made for a great 4 day stay here. Restaurant Row just 3 miles away with everything you could want. Highly recommended for this sort of hotel.

Reviews.Title: “ok”
Reviews.Author: katieinkc
Reviews.Content: stayed here last week. hotel was clean- but our airconditioner leaked water over half of the room . It would have been helpful if the front desk personnel spoke and understood english. saw many frustrated guests try to deal with that issue

Reviews.Title: “Its Biggest Flaw is the Head of Housekeeping ”
Reviews.Author: rocadeuva
Reviews.Content: I staid at the Candlewood suites two years ago for a extended stay and it was great. This time a big problem has been the head of housekeeping, Mr. Fernando. He is rather loud, nosy and wants to know everything about where I work, at what I am leaving, if i left for work, etc. His behaviour is weird and unprofessional and at often times you find him using the computer at the business lounge.

Reviews.Title: “Beware!!!:”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Booked this hotel based on price and proximity to the American Airlines Arena (about 5 miles). Booked a double non-smoking room through Lastminutetraveler. Was told when I showed up that all double non-smoking rooms were taken and would have to take a single or a smoking room. Took the smoking room due to no other options. Stayed 4 days and never had any staff clean, make beds, or bring fresh towels.. Terrible customer service, stay away!!!

Reviews.Title: “A”
Reviews.Author: DDR
Reviews.Content: This property is exhausted. A major make-over is past due. The concept is great. The layout of the rooms are excellant. The managers reception and breakfast are above average. The staff was very helpful and professional. The biggest problem we experianced was charges on our credit card, after we paid cash upon check-out. After calling back to this property and explaining the situation, the clerk we spoke to assured us this would be taken care of. The next week a new charge was added to the credit card along with a credit which still did not fix the problem. The following week the credit was made correctly. Even with this mix-up I would give the staff an excellant rating. They were very helpful and respectful any time we had contact with them. Although, I have to admit with the price of our stay, using our AAA discount, I would stay here again even if the property is in the same condition.

Reviews.Title: “Okay' but only just okay.”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Nice Hotel but needs redecoration. The beds were a bit too soft and the furniture was a little old and broken in places. The bathroom was small and also needed redecoration. The front desk staff were fine. Although the night shift clerk was not very friendly when we checked in. I hope this perhaps has changed maybe he had a bad night?? The surroundings were clean and efficient. This hotel is okay for a night or two and the freeway is easily accessible from hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Showing its age”
Reviews.Author: MrSnarkyPants
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here twice on business. I love Candlewoods because the rooms are comfortable - the desk in the room is perfect to work at - and the $0.25 sodas in the pantry are a nice perk. This one was looking a little worn on the inside. All of the usual Candlewood stuff is here - it's the same layout as all the other Candlewood Suites I've come across, but it is a bigger property than most. The pool is nice. In one room, there was a hole in the wall from someone opening the door too hard. In both rooms there was a fabric shower curtain that wasn't quite long enough and no vinyl liner behind it. The rooms at the front get a lot of freeway noise, so ask for a room at the back. If you need to be near downtown/market center and don't want to fight the traffic, go for this one, but if you don't mind the drive from Los Colinas, the Candlewood there is newer and nicer for about the same rate.

HotelInfo.Name: Candlewood Suites - Dallas Market Center
HotelInfo.Address: 7930 North Stemmons Freeway, Dallas, TX 75247
